verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H94>Agur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3348>Jakeh<s%>, even the <S%H4853>prophecy<s%>: the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5002>spoke<s%> unto <S%H384>Ithiel<s%>, even unto <S%H384>Ithiel<s%> and <S%H401>Ucal<s%>,
Surely I am more <S%H1198>brutish<s%> than any <S%H376>man<s%>, and have not the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>.
I neither <S%H3925>learned<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, nor <S%H3045>have<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

Who has ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, or <S%H3381>descended<s%>? who has <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in his <S%H2651>fists<s%>? who has <S%H6887>bound<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in a <S%H8071>garment<s%>? who has <S%H6965>established<s%> all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? what is his <S%H8034>name<s%>, and what is his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%>, if you can <S%H3045>tell<s%>?
Every <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H6884>pure<s%>: he is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> unto them that put their trust in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
<S%H3254>Add<s%> you not unto his <S%H1697>words<s%>, lest he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H3576>you<s%>, and you be found a liar.
<S%H8147>Two<s%> things have I <S%H7592>required<s%> of <S%H4513>you<s%>; deny me them not before I <S%H4191>die<s%>:

Remove <S%H7368>far<s%> from me <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H1697>lies<s%>: <S%H5414>give<s%> me neither <S%H7389>poverty<s%> nor <S%H6239>riches<s%>; <S%H2963>feed<s%> me with <S%H3899>food<s%> convenient for <S%H2706>me<s%>:

Lest I be <S%H7646>full<s%>, and <S%H3584>deny<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, and say, Who is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? or lest I be <S%H3423>poor<s%>, and <S%H1589>steal<s%>, and <S%H8610>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my God in <S%H430>vain<s%>.
<S%H3960>Accuse<s%> not a <S%H5650>servant<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%>, lest he <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H816>you<s%>, and you be found guilty.
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H7043>curses<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>, and does not <S%H1288>bless<s%> their <S%H517>mother<s%>.
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that are <S%H2889>pure<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and yet is not <S%H7364>washed<s%> from their <S%H6675>filthiness<s%>.
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%>, O how <S%H7311>lofty<s%> are their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>! and their <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> are lifted <S%H5375>up<s%>.

There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%>, whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are as <S%H2719>swords<s%>, and their jaw <S%H4973>teeth<s%> as <S%H3979>knives<s%>, to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from off the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from among <S%H120>men<s%>.

The <S%H5936>horseleach<s%> has <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, <S%H3051>crying<s%>, Give, <S%H3051>give<s%>. There are <S%H7969>three<s%> things that are never <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>, <S%H702>Yes<s%>, four things <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H1952>not<s%>, It is enough:

The <S%H7585>grave<s%>; and the <S%H6115>childless<s%> <S%H7356>womb<s%>; the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is not <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>; and the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H1952>not<s%>, It is enough.

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H3932>mocks<s%> at his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H936>despises<s%> to <S%H3349>obey<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>, the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall pick it <S%H5365>out<s%>, and the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H5404>eagles<s%> shall eat <S%H398>it<s%>.
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which are too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for <S%H702>me<s%>, Yes, four which I know <S%H3045>not<s%>:

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5404>eagle<s%> in the <S%H8064>air<s%>; the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%>; the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H591>boat<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with a <S%H5959>maid<s%>.

Such is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5003>adulterous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>; she <S%H398>eats<s%>, and <S%H4229>wipes<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>says<s%>, I have <S%H6466>done<s%> no <S%H205>wickedness<s%>.
For <S%H7969>three<s%> things the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7264>disquieted<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%> which it <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%>:
For a <S%H5650>servant<s%> when he <S%H4427>reigns<s%>; and a <S%H5036>fool<s%> when he is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>food<s%>;
For a <S%H8130>odious<s%> woman when she is <S%H1166>married<s%>; and a <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> that is <S%H3423>heir<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress<s%>.
There be <S%H702>four<s%> things which are <S%H6996>little<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, but they are <S%H2449>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%>:
The <S%H5244>ants<s%> are a <S%H5971>people<s%> not <S%H5794>strong<s%>, yet they <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3899>food<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer<s%>;
The <S%H8227>conies<s%> are but a <S%H6099>feeble<s%> <S%H5971>folk<s%>, yet <S%H7760>make<s%> they their <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5553>rocks<s%>;
The <S%H697>locusts<s%> have no <S%H4428>king<s%>, yet go they <S%H3318>forth<s%> all of them by <S%H2686>bands<s%>;
The <S%H8079>spider<s%> takes <S%H8610>hold<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and is in <S%H4428>kings<s%>' <S%H1964>palaces<s%>.
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which <S%H6806>go<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%>, <S%H702>Yes<s%>, four are <S%H2895>fitting<s%> in <S%H3212>going<s%>:
A <S%H3918>lion<s%> which is <S%H1368>strongest<s%> among <S%H929>animals<s%>, and turns not <S%H7725>away<s%> for <S%H6440>any<s%>;
A <S%H4975>greyhound<s%>; a he <S%H8495>goat<s%> <S%H176>also<s%>; and a <S%H4428>king<s%>, against whom there is no rising <S%H510>up<s%>.
If you have done <S%H5034>foolishly<s%> in lifting <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H2161>yourself<s%>, or if you have thought evil, lay your <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Surely the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%>, and the <S%H4330>wringing<s%> of the <S%H639>nose<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: so the <S%H4330>forcing<s%> of <S%H639>wrath<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%>.
